definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand

sentences.english: Being minimumally familiar with boxing and muaythai may save your skin someday.
sentences.chinese: 稍微熟悉一下拳擊和泰拳可能會在某天讓你免於捱揍。

sentences.english: We warmly welcome Muay Thai enthusiasts from home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 我們熱烈歡迎來自國內外的泰拳愛好者。

sentences.english: We offer an integrated Muay Thai and Brazilian Jiujitsu program.
sentences.chinese: 我們提供泰拳和巴西柔術的綜合項目。

sentences.english: Lover of snowboarding, group leader in U of T Muay Thai and other outdoor activity clubs.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪愛好者，泰拳俱樂部會員，多個戶外社團的組長。

sentences.english: Lily: She also like free combat and Muay Thai.
All our contents are about muay thai world.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有的內容是關於泰拳的世界。

sentences.english: Thai-style boxing is extremely popular in Thailand .
sentences.chinese: 泰拳是一種在泰國非常流行的打鬥藝術。

sentences.english: Besides Thai Boxing, the popular sports in Thailand include boxing and soccer.
sentences.chinese: 除了泰拳之外，泰國流行的運動還包括拳擊和足球。

sentences.english: She also like free combat and Muay Thai.

definition: to fight, esp. with hands/wrestling (as a sport)/to wrestle/to wrestle (against fate, with a problem etc)/to capture prey
Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art
